User Stories Addressed

Manage App Versions

  1. I want to continue an existing submission that’s been saved but not yet submitted for review

    Related Github issue | Related Design Story | View prototype

  2. I want to resubmit a version of my app and provide an explanation, if the review team comes back saying “rejected” or “more information needed”.

    Related Github issue | Related Design Story | View prototype

  3. I want to publish a version of the app that has been reviewed as “approved”.

    Related Github issue | Related Design Story | View prototype

  4. I want to add a new version of the manifest or packaged file, and submit it for review

    Related Github issue | Related Design Story | View prototype
